short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize the Google Keyword Planner UI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Google Keyword Planner UI Customizer

Customize the Google Keyword Planner interface
Toggle UI elements on/off
Options include:

- Hide notification bar
- Hide app bar
- Hide navigation drawer
- Hide tab strip
- Hide toolbar
- Hide side drawer
- Increase font size for better readability

Reduce distractions
Enhance focus while planning keywords
